fields.name: B & Tea Balancing Toner
fields.description: A gentle, alcohol-free blend enhanced with Provitamin B5 and fortifying anti-oxidants. Refines pores, balances and prepares skin for hydration. Suited to most skin types, including combination and sensitive.
fields.ingredients:
Water (Aqua), Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Polysorbate 80, Hamamelis Virginiana (Witch Hazel) Water, 
                            Sodium Gluconate, Sodium Lactate, Benzyl Alcohol, Phenoxyethanol, Sorbitol, Panthenol, Cananga Odorata 
                            Flower Oil, Disodium EDTA, Sodium Citrate, Benzoic Acid, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Benzalkonium Chloride, 
                            Dehydroacetic Acid, Ethylhexylglycerin, Citric Acid, Linalool, Benzyl Benzoate, Benzyl Salicylate, Farnesol, 
                            Geraniol, Eugenol, Isoeugenol

fields.name: Double-Edge Razor
fields.description: Featuring a hand-polished and triple-plated collar, this high density handle and chrome-plated blade head are perfectly balanced to facilitate an immaculate shave. Sold with ten stainless steel Merkur Solingen razor blades. Handmade by skilled English craftsmen.
fields.ingredients: stainless steel, wood

fields.name: Parsley Seed Anti-Oxidant Serum
fields.description: A lightweight formulation with a complex blend of anti-oxidant rich ingredients in a soothing Aloe Vera base. Hydrates, softens and fortifies the skin. Suited to most skin types, particularly combination and oily.
fields.ingredients:
Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Water (Aqua), Polysorbate 80, Sorbitol, PEG-150 Distearate, 
                            Polysorbate 20, Benzyl Alcohol, Phenoxyethanol, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil, Panthenol, 
                            Disodium EDTA, Citric Acid, Sodium Citrate, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Dehydroacetic Acid, 
                            Ormenis Multicaulis Oil, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Extract, Carum Petroselinum (Parsley) Seed Oil, 
                            Linalool, Limonene, Geraniol

fields.name: Moroccan Neroli Post-Shave Lotion
fields.description: A unisex hydrator boosted with botanical oils that lightly hydrate and balance skin while pacifying post-shave irritation and aggravation. Suited to normal, combination and sensitive skin
fields.ingredients:
Water (Aqua), Rosa Canina Fruit Oil, Glycerin, Cetearyl Olivate, Cetearyl Alcohol, Stearic Acid, 
                            Hamamelis Virginiana (Witch Hazel) Water, Sorbitan Olivate, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea Butter), Polysorbate 20, 
                            Phenoxyethanol, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Fusanus Spicatus Wood Oil, Bisabolol, Panthenol, Sodium Benzoate, 
                            Disodium EDTA, Sodium Citrate, Pogostemon Cablin Oil, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Flower Oil, Eugenia Caryophyllus 
                            (Clove) Flower Oil, Zingiber Officinale (Ginger) Root Extract, Benzoic Acid, Farnesol, Eugenol, Linalool, d-Limonene, 
                            Geraniol

fields.name: Purifying Facial Exfoliant Paste
fields.description: A cream-based cleansing formulation enhanced with fine Quartz and Lactic Acid to slough away dead skin cells and soften the skin. Suited to most skin types, particularly dry. Frequent travellers, shavers, winter and cool climates
fields.ingredients:
Water (Aqua), Quartz, Glyceryl Stearate SE, Rosa Canina Fruit Oil, Oenothera Biennis (Evening Primrose) Oil, Glycerin, 
                            C12-16 Alcohols, Lactic Acid, Sodium Cocoyl Isethionate, Phenoxyethanol, Xanthan Gum, Ormenis Multicaulis Oil, Sodium Hydroxide, Coconut Acid, 
                            Sclerotium Gum, Lecithin, Pullulan, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Oil, Disodium EDTA, Sodium 
                            Isethionate, Silica, Limonene, Linaloo

fields.name: Shaving Brush
fields.description: A soft yet robust synthetic Silver Tip Fibre brush of the finest quality, which mimics the natural feel and exceptional performance of badger hair. Handmade in England. Suited to discerning shavers.
fields.ingredients: eco-friendly plastic, natural fibers

fields.name: Moroccan Neroli Shaving Serum
fields.description: A blend of hydrating botanicals formulated for maximum slip to facilitate a razor-close shave; also calms and softens the skin. Suited to all skin types.
fields.ingredients:
Water (Aqua), Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Glycerin, Cocamine Oxide, Polysorbate 20, Sorbitol, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, 
                            Phenoxyethanol, Hydroxyacetophenone, PEG-18 Glyceryl Oleate/Cocoate, Fusanus Spicatus Wood Oil, Sodium Lauroamphoacetate, 
                            Panthenol, Saccharide Isomerate, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Flower Oil, Citric Acid, Pogostemon Cablin Oil, 
                            Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Linalool, Sodium Chloride, Farnesol, Limonene, Eugenia Caryophyllus (Clove) Flower Oil, 
                            Eugenol, Glycyrrhiza Glabra (Licorice) Root Extract, Tropolone, Geraniol, Sodium Citrate, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate

fields.name: Moroccan Neroli Shaving Duet
fields.description: For all who shave, enjoy in concert to maintain smooth, calm, hydrated and remarkably soft skin. A pair of sophisticated formulations to achieve the perfect shave
fields.ingredients: Moroccan Neroli Shaving Serum, Moroccan Neroli Post-Shave Lotion

fields.name: hydrating body cream - la lotion infinie
fields.description: ARgENTUM utilises the inherent strength of silver to deliver la lotion infinie, a natural, protective, super hydrating body cream. After many years of research in the field of dermo-cosmetics, we have formulated a patented fusion of two vital ingredients, Silver Hydrosol & DNA HP, the essence of our award winning la potion infinie.
fields.ingredients:
Colloidal Silver (Silver Hydrosol), Aqua, Glycerin (from the Karanja Tree), Dicaprylyl Carbonate (Vegetal Origin), 
                            Butyrospermum Parkii Butter (Shea Butter), Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride (from Coconut Oil), Cetearyl Alcohol, 
                            Hydrogenated Vegetable Glycerides (RSPO Palm Oil), Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil (Argan Oil), Caffeine, 
                            Cetearyl Glucoside (Sugar and Coconut Extract), Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis Oil (Sweet Almond Oil), Sodium Stearoyl Glutamate 
                            (from Vegetal Oil), Sodium Benzoate (Soil Association/Ecocert Preservative), Tocopherol (Vitamin E), Aloe Barbadensis Leaf 
                            Extract (Aloe Vera Extract), Xanthan Gum (Vegetal Origin), Helianthus Annuus Seed Oil (Sunflower Oil), Potassium Sorbate 
                            (Soil Association/Ecocert Preservative), Parfum, Citric Acid (Vegetal Origin), Sodium DNA (DNA HP), Sodium Gluconate, 
                            Limonene (Essential Oil), Linalool (Essential Oil), Eugenol (Essential Oil)

fields.name: illuminating hydration bar - le savon lune
fields.description:
The key to a luminous complexion is hydration, so we have infused le savon lune with our patented fusion of Silver Hydrosol 
                            & DNA HP to create a soap-free cleanser that helps restore the natural balance of your skin. Our unique formulation is enhanced 
                            by Bentonite, a colloidal clay composed of aged volcanic ash, traditionally used for its treatment of everyday skincare.
fields.ingredients:
Disodium Lauryl Sulfosuccinate, Cetearyl Alcohol (Coconut Oil Wax), Triticum Vulgare (Wheat) Starch, Colloidal Silver 
                            (Silver Hydrosol), Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Glycerin (from the Karanja Tree), Coco Glucoside, Stearic Acid, Butyrospermum 
                            Parkii Butter (Shea Butter), Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Bentonite, Sodium DNA (DNA HP), Citric Acid, Parfum (Fragrance), Limonene 
                            (Essential Oil), Linalool (Essential Oil), Eugenol (Essential Oil)

fields.name: nourishing oil milk cleanser - la lune de velours
fields.description: A nourishing oil milk cleanser that effectively removes make-up, whilst deeply hydrating the skin, combining cutting edge science with natural and organic skin-soothing oils such as Vitamin E, Sweet Almond Oil and Argan Oil. We have formulated a patented fusion of two vital ingredients, Silver Hydrosol & DNA HP, the essence of our award-winning la potion infinie.
fields.ingredients:
Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis Oil (Sweet Almond Oil), Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil (Argan Oil), Glycerin (from the Karanja Tree), 
                            Colloidal Silver (Silver Hydrosol), Aqua, Tocopherol Acetate (Vitamin E), Citric Acid (Vegetal Origin), Sodium Benzoate 
                            (Soil Association/Ecocert Preservative), Potassium Sorbate (Soil Association/Ecocert Preservative), Sodium DNA (DNA HP), 
                            Limonene (Essential Oil), Linalool (Essential Oil), Eugenol (Essential Oil)

fields.name: Bamboo Cotton Buds
fields.description: The main alternatives to plastic cotton buds are paper and bamboo cotton buds. Both alternatives are better than plastic. Bamboo sticks, however, are eco-friendlier than paper cotton buds, which are made from wood and paper glue. The raw bamboo stick needs less resources to be made and is sturdier.
fields.ingredients: bamboo, cotton

fields.name: Bamboo Safety Razor
fields.description: Traditional safety razors are an effective swap for plastic-free shaving. These zero-waste razors were widely used before the mass production of single-use razors. Major shaving companies, who only had profit in mind, made the traditional razor forgotten. Still, the zero-waste razors are now the best alternative to cartridge razors, for men and women alike.
fields.ingredients: bamboo, stainless steel

fields.name: Black Metal Safety Razor
fields.description: Traditional safety razors are an effective swap for plastic-free shaving. Metal safety razors were widely used before the mass production of single-use razors. Major shaving companies, who only had profit in mind, made the traditional razor forgotten. Still, a double edge razor now the best alternative to cartridge razors, for men and women alike.
fields.ingredients: stainless steel

fields.name: Rose Gold Metal Safety Razor
fields.description: Traditional safety razors are an effective swap for plastic-free shaving. Metal safety razors were widely used before the mass production of single-use razors. Major shaving companies, who only had profit in mind, made the traditional razor forgotten. Still, a double edge razor now the best alternative to cartridge razors, for men and women alike.
fields.ingredients: stainless steel

fields.name: Silver Metal Safety Razor
fields.description: Traditional safety razors are an effective swap for plastic-free shaving. Metal safety razors were widely used before the mass production of single-use razors. Major shaving companies, who only had profit in mind, made the traditional razor forgotten. Still, a double edge razor now the best alternative to cartridge razors, for men and women alike.
fields.ingredients: stainless steel

fields.name: Silk Floss
fields.description: Flossing: We all know we should do it more often. Dentists recommend doing it every day. Unfortunately, floss is mostly made of nylon and comes in a disposable plastic packaging. So, basically, it is plastic wrapped in plastic. Being small and lightweight, floss thread is part of the plastic products that most easily enter the environment.
fields.ingredients: silk, candelilla wax, peppermint aroma, stainless steel floss dispensers

fields.name: Conditioner for Fine Hair with Rosemary & Peppermint
fields.description: Give fine hair weightless volume and shine with John Masters Organics invigorating Conditioner for Fine Hair with Rosemary & Peppermint. Organic Rosemary Oil extract detoxifies and optimizes conditions for the natural hair cycle, adding body and volume. Organic Peppermint Oil helps to rid hair of build-up while creating a cooling effect to help with circulation.
fields.ingredients:
Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice (Aloe Vera), Cetearyl Alcohol, Water, Glycerin, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) 
                            Leaf Oil, Mentha Piperita (Peppermint) Oil, Mentha Viridis (Spearmint) Leaf Oi, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Extract, Simmondsia Chinensis 
                            (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Borago Officinalis Seed Oil, Linum Usitatissimum (Linseed) Seed Oil, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Sodium 
                            Phytate, Calendula Officinalis Flower Extract (Calendula), Foeniculum Vulgare (Fennel) Seed Extract, Equisetum Arvense Leaf Extract 
                            (Horsetail), Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract (White Tea), Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract, Hippophae Rhamnoides 
                            (Sea Buckthorn) Fruit Oil, Panthenol (Vitamin B-5), Tocopherol, Behentrimonium Methosulfate, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, 
                            Stearalkonium Chloride, Menthol, Dehydroacetic Acid, Benzyl Alcohol, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate, Citric Acid, Limonene

fields.name: Hair Milk with Rose & Apricot
fields.description: John Masters Organics Hair Milk with Rose & Apricot is a lightweight, leave-in treatment and styler that offers major moisture and shine. This silicone-free formula provides the perfect level of hydration to protect and soften strands, leaving them shiny and more manageable. This hydrating, lightweight styling product is ideal for revitalizing dull, dry hair.
fields.ingredients:
Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice (Aloe), Rosa Centifolia Flower Water (Rose), Coconut Alkanes, Glycerin, Cetearyl Alcohol, 
                            Coco-Caprylate/Caprate, Behentrimonium Methosulfate, Behentrimonium Chloride, Cetyl Alcohol, Stearyl Alcohol, Helianthus Annuus 
                            (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Panthenol (Vitamin B5), Sodium PCA, Pelargonium Graveolens Oil (Geranium), Gluconolactone, Citrus 
                            Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Peel Oil, Sodium Benzoate, Prunus Armeniaca (Apricot) Kernel Oil, Theobroma Grandiflorum Seed Butter 
                            (Cupuaçu), Borago Officinalis Seed Oil (Borage), Calcium Gluconate, Xylitylglucoside, Anthemis Nobilis Flower Oil (Chamomile), 
                            Anhydroxylitol, Xylitol, Limonene†, Citronellol†, Geraniol†, Linalool†, Citral†

fields.name: Hair Paste
fields.description: Great for men and women with short or long hair (and everything in between), it offers incredible volume and texture with just the right amount of hold for every style you can whip up. A soft matte finish completes the look. Offers incredible flexibility while styling, gives hair unbelievable texture, and locks down an effortless hold to your look.
fields.ingredients:
Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe Vera) Leaf Juice, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Extract, Cera Alba (Beeswax), Mel (Honey), Bentonite, 
                            Tapioca Starch, Stearic Acid, Myristic Acid, Glyceryl Stearate SE, Cetearyl Olivate, Sorbitan Olivate, Butyrospermum Parkii 
                            (Shea) Butter, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Linum Usitatissimum (Linseed) Seed Oil, Aqua (Water), Theobroma 
                            Cacao (Cocoa) Seed Butter, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Citrus Bergamia (Bergamot) Fruit Oil, Panthenol (Vitamin B5), 
                            Boswellia Carteri (Frankincense) Oil, Equisetum Arvense (Horsetail) Extract, Achillea Millefolium (Yarrow) Extract, 
                            Lauric Acid, Palmitic Acid, Citric Acid, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate, Limonene, Linalool

fields.name: Pineapple Lip Calm
fields.description: Soothe and soften dry, chapped lips with John Masters Organics' nourishing Lip Calm formula in an exclusive Pineapple flavor. This fan-favorite lip balm is created with the finest organic ingredients like jojoba, olive and borage oils. This balm provides impeccable softening, deep hydration and unbeatable protection against cold weather and wind.
fields.ingredients:
Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Beeswax, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, 
                            Flavor (Pineapple), Linum Usitatissimum (Linseed) Seed Oil, Borago Officinalis Seed Oil, Rosa Moschata Seed Oil (Rosehip)

fields.name: Scalp Follicle Treatment & Volumizer
fields.description: Powered by a proprietary combination of nature's well-known cure-alls, John Masters Organics' Scalp Follicle Treatment & Volumizer creates the optimal conditions for fuller, healthier-looking hair. Organic Irish moss strengthens the roots and moisturizes dry scalp. A combination of organic extracts nourishes and balances sebum levels, while thyme renews the scalp.
fields.ingredients:
Water, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice (Aloe Vera), Cocoyl Proline, Glycerin, Hamamelis Virginiana (Witch Hazel) Extract, 
                            Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Flower Oil, Hydrolyzed Barley Protein, Centella Asiatica Extract (Gotu Kola), Chondrus 
                            Crispus Extract (Irish Moss), Plantago Major Leaf Extract (Plantain Leaf), Arctium Lappa Root Extract (Burdock Root), 
                            Urtica Dioica (Nettle) Leaf Extract, Yucca Schidigera Leaf/Root/Stem Extract, Arnica Montana Flower Extract, Eucalyptus 
                            Globulus Leaf Oil, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract (White Tea), Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Flower/Leaf/Stem Extract, 
                            Carica Papaya (Papaya) Fruit Extract, Calendula Officinalis Flower Extract, Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber) Fruit Extract, 
                            Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Oil, Anthemis Nobilis Flower Extract (Chamomile), Thymus Vulgaris (Thyme) Leaf Oil, 
                            Phytic Acid, Melaleuca Alternifolia (Tea Tree) Leaf Oil, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Triticum Vulgare (Wheat) 
                            Germ Oil, Linum Usitatissimum (Linseed) Seed Oil, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Salicylic Acid, Sorbic Acid, Benzyl Alcohol, Potassium 
                            Sorbate, Linalool, Limonene, Geraniol

fields.name: Scalp Purifying Serum with Spearmint & Meadowsweet
fields.description: John Masters Organics' Scalp Purifying Serum with Spearmint & Meadowsweet harnesses the natural properties of cooling spearmint and peppermint, natural-astringent meadowsweet extract and strengthening vitamin B complex. This revitalizing formula helps to detoxify, purify and nourish the scalp and restore hair health.
fields.ingredients:
Water, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Glycerin, Triethyl Citrate, Hydrolyzed Barley Protein, Spiraea Ulmaria Flower Extract 
                            (Meadowsweet), Mentha Piperita (Peppermint) Oil, Mentha Viridis (Spearmint) Leaf Oil, Gaultheria Procumbens (Wintergreen) 
                            Leaf Oil, Tamarindus Indica Seed Polysaccharide, Xanthan Gum, Cellulose Gum, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate, Limonene

fields.name: Scalp Stimulating Shampoo with Spearmint & Meadowsweet
fields.description: Powered by organic spearmint leaf oil and meadowsweet flower extract targets oily scalp conditions by detoxifying the scalp and regulating sebum production. Organic spearmint and peppermint oils stimulate and refresh the scalp while organic meadowsweet flower extract and eucalyptus oil act as natural astringents to balance sebum levels and improve scalp health.
fields.ingredients:
Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice (Aloe Vera), Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Sodium Lauroyl Methyl Isethionate, Glycerin, Water, 
                            Sodium Levulinate, Mentha Viridis (Spearmint) Leaf Oil, Spiraea Ulmaria Flower Extract (Meadowsweet), Mentha Piperita 
                            (Peppermint) Oil, Illicium Verum (Anise) Fruit/Seed Oil, Eugenia Caryophyllus (Clove) Leaf Oil, Mentha Arvensis Leaf Oil, 
                            Gaultheria Procumbens (Wintergreen) Leaf Oil, Apium Graveolens (Celery) Seed Extract, Lactobacillus/Punica Granatum Fruit 
                            Ferment Extract (Pomegranate), Capsicum Frutescens Fruit Extract, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Smithsonite 
                            Extract, Eucalyptus Globulus Leaf Oil (Eucalyptus), Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Oenothera Biennis (Evening 
                            Primrose) Oil, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Linum Usitatissimum (Linseed) Seed Oil, Tocopheryl Acetate 
                            (Vitamin E), Panthenol (Vitamin B-5), Mentha Viridis (Spearmint) Leaf Oil, Mentha Piperita (Peppermint) Oil, Gaultheria 
                            Procumbens (Wintergreen) Leaf Oil, Hydrolyzed Soy Protein, Decyl Glucoside, Sodium Phytate, Sodium PCA, Caprylic/Capric 
                            Triglyceride, Caramel, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate, Citric Acid, Limonene

fields.name: Lavender Rosemary Shampoo for normal hair
fields.description: Lavender and rosemary extracts are combined with 13 other certified organic ingredients plus soy protein to leave hair healthy, shiny and manageable. Does not contain sodium lauryl sulfate. Safe for color-treated hair.
fields.ingredients:
Aloe barbadensis (aloe vera leaf juice) gel, aqua (water), decyl glucoside, sodium lauroamphoacetate, sodium cocoyl 
                            sulfoacetate, babassuamidopropyl betaine, panthenol (vitamin B5), lavandula angustifolia (lavender) oil, rosmarinus 
                            officinalis (rosemary) leaf oil, hydrolyzed soy protein, wheat amino acids, sorbitol, symphytum officinale (comfrey) 
                            leaf extract, chamomilla recutica (chamomile) flower extract, lavandula angustifolia (lavender) flower/leaf/stem extract, 
                            urtica dioica (nettle) root extract, equisetum hiemale (horsetail) leaf/stem extract, achillea millefolium (yarrow) 
                            extract, camellia sinensis (white tea) extract, salix alba (willow) bark extract, lonicera caprifolium (honeysuckle) 
                            flower extract, potassium sorbate, sodium benzoate, guar hydroxypropyl trimonium chloride, linum usitatissimum (flaxseed) 
                            seed oil, borago officinalis (borage) seed oil, helianthus annuus (sunflower) seed oil, simmondsia chinensis (jojoba) 
                            seed oil, tocopherol, sulfur, glycerin

fields.name: Travel Kit
fields.description: A complete set of four essential best sellers for your hair and body care needs in a beautiful, eco-friendly travel bag. Travel kit is phthalate-free – made from organic cotton denim and EVA/PEVA.
fields.ingredients:
lavander rosemary shampoo for normal hair, blood orange and vanilla body milk, blood orange and vanilla body wash, citrus 
                            and neroli detangler, eco-friendly travel bag

fields.name: Blanc Hand and Body Soap
fields.description: Infused with warm, noble notes of jasmine and meadowsweet, as well as hints of ripened fruit, this 100% natural, fragrant soap celebrates the beauty of the painfully short Northern summers. Suitable for body and hands. Enriched with natural essential oils and hydrating plant sugars, leaves your skin clean, silky smooth and soft.
fields.ingredients:
Sodium Palmate, Sodium cocoate, Aqua, Glycerin, Aroma, Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Sodium Citrate, Mica (CI 77019), 
                            Betaine, Filipendula Ulmaria (Meadowsweet) Flower Extract, Jasminum Officinale (Jasmine) Flower Extract, Hydrolyzed Algin, 
                            Limonene, Linalool, Citronellol, Geraniol

fields.description: Purifying and nourishing detox soap with activated charcoal and orris-pine fragrance. The purifying power of charcoal draws out toxins and impurities to deeply, yet gently, cleanse your skin. Mysterious notes of orris and pine feel like a revitalising swim in an unspoilt forest lake. Based on natural coconut oil. Sulfate, palm and microplastic free. 100% biodegradable.
fields.ingredients:
Sodium cocoate, Aqua, Glycerin, Coconut Acid, Charcoal Powder, Aroma, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, 
                            Sodium Citrate, Sodium Chloride, Betaine, Linalool

fields.name: Volcano Scrub Soap
fields.description: Scrub soap with volcanic minerals and natural cedar-lime fragrance. Black lava sand gently removes all impurities and dead cells, leaving your skin refreshed, nourished and silky smooth, while the bright, uplifting notes of cedar and lime soon dispel all your grumpiness and fatigue. Based on natural coconut oil. Sulfate, palm and microplastic free. 100% biodegradable.
fields.ingredients:
Sodium cocoate, Aqua, Glycerin, Coconut Acid, Aroma, Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Volcanic Sand, Simmondsia Chinensis 
                            (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Sodium Citrate, Sodium Chloride, Mica (CI 77019), Betaine, Eugenol, Limonene, Linalool

fields.name: RYTMO Shaving set
fields.description: For the natural materials we have chosen olive wood in warm shades and bog oak as a darker contrast. Selected sections of wood from trunks up to 3,000 years old are used. Simple, high-quality chrome rims accentuate the beautiful surfaces of the handle materials.
fields.ingredients: wood, natural fiber, stainless steel

fields.name: ROCCA Shaving Set
fields.description: For the natural materials we have chosen birch bark. High-quality stainless steel razor and the blades are perfectly balanced to facilitate an immaculate shave.
fields.ingredients: birch bark, stainless steel, natural fiber

fields.name: Charcoal Infused Bamboo Toothbrush
fields.description: Our charcoal infused bamboo toothbrush isn’t like any other bamboo toothbrush. The charcoal-infused bristles will both cleanse and brighten your teeth, making you feel as though you’ve just stepped out of the hygienist. The activated charcoal will also provide antibacterial properties to help fight bacteria and anti-inflammatory properties qualities to soothe gums.
fields.ingredients: bamboo, activated charcoal

fields.name: Dental Floss
fields.description: Our cruelty free dental floss refills are infused with peppermint oil and charcoal to not only cleanse and brighten your teeth, but it will also leave your mouth as fresh as a daisy.
fields.ingredients: charcoal fibre, peppermint, candelilla wax

fields.name: Eco Toothbrush
fields.description: Our eco toothbrush is the perfect toothbrush. Not only is the bamboo we use sustainable and ethically-sourced, the fully recyclable bristles are infused with the stuff too, offering antibacterial protection.
fields.ingredients: bamboo, bamboo fiber bristles
